snippet: It looks as though Rick Santorum, who initially got a fairly large bounce after his near-win in Iowa, may be the latest example of a candidate with somewhat ephemeral momentum.
abstract: It looks as though Rick Santorum, who initially got a fairly large bounce after his near-win in Iowa, may be the latest example of a candidate with somewhat ephemeral momentum.

headline.main: Some Signs in Polls That Santorum's Momentum Has Stalled
